(source file: FileForm.pizza)
java.lang.Object

   +----zeta.form.Form

The pure class interface. 
public class FileForm
  extends Form
The class of file selector forms.

A file form represents file input.

Author:
Wolfgang Grieskamp (wg@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: FileForm.pizza,v 1.3 1998/10/27 11:04:19 wg Exp $

FileForm(Mode, State)
Construct a file form from a mode and state.

mode
The mode of the file form.
state
The state of the file form.

getSyntax()
Get syntax description
parse(Session, Locator, String[], int)
Parse the given sequence of words starting at index
unparse(Session)
Unparse the internal state of the form

Mode
The class of file form modes.
State
The class of file form states.

FileForm
public FileForm(Mode mode,
                State state);
Construct a file form from a mode and state.

state
public final State state;
The state of the file form.

mode

public final Mode mode;
The mode of the file form.

parse
public int parse(Session session,
                 Locator locator,
                 String[] words,
                 int start)
  throws zeta.session.Failures.FormFailed;
Parse the given sequence of words starting at index. Takes the first word in the sequence and stores it in the state. According to mode, existence of a file or directory is checked, and an exception may be thrown.

Overrides:
parse in class Form

unparse

public String[] unparse(Session session);
Unparse the internal state of the form. Returns the name of the file.

Overrides:
unparse in class Form
